bike.description: Demo 8 FSR frame, super low center of gravity and standover with sub-seatstay actuated shock, full cartridge bearing pivots, 26" F/R wheel, 8" of travel with full chainguide and front derailleur compatibility, ISCG mount, rear derailleur protector, 26 and 24" wheel compatible with two geometry settings, 16.7" chainstay length, forged and CNC'd OS HT, Super ORE TT/DT, Demo tool

components.description: Fox DHX 5.0 coil 8.75"x2.75", adjustable rebound, ProPedal, bottom out control, IFP pressure
Fox 40 RC2, 200mm travel, external rebound, hi/low speed compression adjustment, 20mm thru axle
1 1/8" alloy upper cup with OS bearing, 7050 alloy lower cup with 13mm insertion
Truvativ Holzfeller, CNC stem, 40mm, 31.8 clamp
Specialized Demo rise bar, 6066 alloy, 31.8mm, 6 degree upsweep, 9 degree backsweep
Specialized MTB grip, natural/black
Avid Juicy 7, hydraulic disc, 8" Polygon rotor
Avid Juicy 7, hydraulic disc, 8" Polygon rotor

SRAM X.0 carbon, micro cage

SRAM PC-971 with Power Link
Truvativ Holzfeller with Blackspire DS-1 Lexan Guide, 170mm
38T alloy, 4 bolt, compact 104mm pattern
Truvativ Howitzer Team, oversize sealed outboard cartridge bearing, 73mm shell
Lo-Pro Magnesium platform, removable pins, oversize Cr-Mo axle
Mavic EX721, 26", 36 hole
Specialized disc, 36 hole, 20mm thru axle
Specialized disc, 36 hole bolt on axle, 135mm spacing
2.0 stainless, black, brass nipples

Specialized Chunder 26x2.3" 60 TPI, aramid bead, 2 ply, Butyl insert, soft compound
